00035     //proxy class for single vector entries (this is a slow operation!!)
00043     template <typename SCALARTYPE>
00044     class vector_entry_proxy
00045     {
00046       public:
00053         explicit vector_entry_proxy(unsigned int index, 
00054                                     viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_command_queue> const & command_queue,
00055                                     viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> const & elements) 
00056          : _index(index), _command_queue(command_queue), _elements(elements) {};
00057         
00058          
00059         //operators:
00062         vector_entry_proxy & operator+=(SCALARTYPE value)
00063         {
00064           SCALARTYPE temp = read();
00065           temp += value; 
00066           write(temp);         
00067           return *this;
00068         }
00069 
00072         vector_entry_proxy &  operator-=(SCALARTYPE value)
00073         {
00074           SCALARTYPE temp = read();
00075           temp -= value; 
00076           write(temp);         
00077           return *this;
00078         }
00079 
00082         vector_entry_proxy &  operator*=(SCALARTYPE value)
00083         {
00084           SCALARTYPE temp = read();
00085           temp *= value; 
00086           write(temp);         
00087           return *this;
00088         }
00089 
00092         vector_entry_proxy &  operator/=(SCALARTYPE value)
00093         {
00094           SCALARTYPE temp = read();
00095           temp /= value; 
00096           write(temp);         
00097           return *this;
00098         }
00099 
00102         vector_entry_proxy &  operator=(SCALARTYPE value)
00103         {
00104           write(value);
00105           return *this;
00106         }
00107 
00110         vector_entry_proxy & operator=(scalar<SCALARTYPE> const & value)
00111         {
00112           cl_int err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(_command_queue, value.handle(), _elements, 0, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*_index, sizeof(SCALARTYPE), 0, NULL, NULL);
00113           //assert(err == CL_SUCCESS);
00114           CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00115           return *this;
00116         }
00117 
00120         vector_entry_proxy &  operator=(vector_entry_proxy const & other)
00121         {
00122           cl_int err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(_command_queue,
00123                                            other._elements, //src
00124                                            _elements,       //dest
00125                                            sizeof(SCALARTYPE) * other._index, //offset src
00126                                            sizeof(SCALARTYPE) * _index,       //offset dest
00127                                            sizeof(SCALARTYPE), 0, NULL, NULL);
00128           CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00129           return *this;
00130         }
00131 
00132         //type conversion:
00133         // allows to write something like:
00134         //  double test = vector(4);
00141         operator SCALARTYPE () const
00142         {
00143           SCALARTYPE temp = read();
00144           return temp;
00145         }
00146         
00149         unsigned int index() const { return _index; }
00150         
00153         viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> const & handle() const { return _elements; }
00154 
00155       private:
00158         SCALARTYPE read() const
00159         {
00160           SCALARTYPE temp;
00161           cl_int err;
00162           err = clEnqueueReadBuffer(_command_queue, _elements, CL_TRUE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*_index, sizeof(SCALARTYPE), &temp, 0, NULL, NULL);
00163           //assert(err == CL_SUCCESS);
00164           CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00165           viennacl::ocl::finish();
00166           return temp;
00167         }
00168         
00171         void write(SCALARTYPE value)
00172         {
00173           cl_int err;
00174           err = clEnqueueWriteBuffer(_command_queue, _elements, CL_TRUE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*_index, sizeof(SCALARTYPE), &value, 0, NULL, NULL);
00175           //assert(err == CL_SUCCESS);
00176           CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00177         }
00178         
00179         unsigned int _index;
00180         viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_command_queue> const & _command_queue;
00181         viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> const & _elements;
00182     }; //vector_entry_proxy

00197     template <typename LHS, typename RHS, typename OP>
00198     class vector_expression
00199     {
00200       public:
00203         typedef typename viennacl::tools::VECTOR_EXTRACTOR<LHS, RHS>::ResultType    VectorType;
00204       
00205         vector_expression(LHS & lhs, RHS & rhs) : _lhs(lhs), _rhs(rhs) {}
00206         
00209         LHS & get_lhs() const { return _lhs; }
00212         RHS & get_rhs() const { return _rhs; }
00213         
00215         unsigned int size() const { return viennacl::tools::VECTOR_SIZE_DEDUCER<LHS, RHS, OP>::size(_lhs, _rhs); }
00216         
00217       private:
00219         LHS & _lhs;
00221         RHS & _rhs;
00222     };

00242     template<class SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00243     class const_vector_iterator
00244     {
00245         typedef const_vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>    self_type;
00246       public:
00247         typedef scalar<SCALARTYPE>            value_type;
00248         typedef long                          difference_type;
00249         
00254         const_vector_iterator(vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> const & vec, unsigned int index) : _index(index), _vec(vec) {};
00255         
00256         value_type operator*(void) const { return _vec[_index]; }
00257         self_type & operator++(void) { ++_index; return *this; }
00258         self_type & operator++(int) { self_type tmp = *this; ++(*this); return tmp; }
00259         
00260         bool operator==(self_type const & other) { return _index == other._scalar; }
00261         bool operator!=(self_type const & other) { return _index != other._scalar; }
00262         
00263         difference_type operator-(self_type const & other) const { difference_type result = _index; return result - other._index; }
00264         self_type operator+(difference_type diff) const { return self_type(_vec, _index + diff); }
00265         
00266         vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> const & get_vector_readable() const { return _vec; }
00267 
00268       protected:
00270         unsigned int _index;
00271 
00272       private:
00273         vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> const & _vec;
00274     };
00275

00296     template<class SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00297     class vector_iterator : public const_vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>
00298     {
00299         typedef const_vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>  base_type;
00300         typedef vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>    self_type;
00301       public:
00306         vector_iterator(vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & vec, unsigned int index) : base_type(vec, index), _vec(vec) {};
00307 
00308         vector_entry_proxy<SCALARTYPE> operator*(void) { return _vec[base_type::_index]; }
00309         
00310         vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & get_vector_writeable() const { return _vec; }
00311         
00312         operator base_type() const
00313         {
00314           return base_type(_vec, base_type::_index);
00315         }
00316       
00317       private:
00318         vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & _vec;
00319     };

00321     // forward definition in VCLForwards.h!
00330     template<class SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00331     class vector
00332     {
00333       
00334     public:
00335       typedef scalar<typename viennacl::tools::CHECK_SCALAR_TEMPLATE_ARGUMENT<SCALARTYPE>::ResultType>   value_type;
00336       typedef const_vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>      const_iterator;
00337       typedef vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>            iterator;
00338 
00341       vector() : _size(0), _internal_size(0) { viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::init();  }
00342 
00347       explicit vector(unsigned int vec_size) :
00348         _size(vec_size), _internal_size(viennacl::tools::roundUpToNextMultiple<unsigned int>(size(), ALIGNMENT))
00349       {
00350         viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::init(); 
00351         
00352         if (_size > 0)
00353           _elements = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*_internal_size);
00354         
00355         //force entries above _size to zero:
00356         if (_size < _internal_size)
00357         {
00358           std::vector<SCALARTYPE> temp(_internal_size - _size);
00359           cl_int err = clEnqueueWriteBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements, CL_TRUE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*_size, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*(_internal_size - _size), &(temp[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00360           //assert(err == CL_SUCCESS);
00361           CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00362         }
00363       }
00364 
00369       vector(const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & vec) :
00370         _size(vec.size()), _internal_size(vec.internal_size())
00371       {
00372         viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<SCALARTYPE, 1>::init(); 
00373         
00374         if (size() != 0)
00375         {
00376           _elements = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*_internal_size);
00377           cl_int err;
00378           err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), vec.handle(), _elements, 0, 0, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*_internal_size, 0, NULL, NULL);
00379           //assert(err == CL_SUCCESS);
00380           CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00381         }
00382       }
00383 
00386       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & operator=(const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & vec)
00387       {
00388         resize(vec.size());
00389         if (size() != 0)
00390         {
00391           cl_int err;
00392           err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), vec.handle(), _elements, 0, 0, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*_internal_size, 0, NULL, NULL);
00393           CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00394         }
00395         return *this;
00396       }

00403       template <typename VectorType>   //use template to cover const/non-const of VectorType:
00404       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & operator = (const vector_expression< VectorType,
00405                                                                            const scalar<SCALARTYPE>,
00406                                                                            op_prod> & proxy)
00407       {
00408         resize(proxy.get_lhs().size());
00409         //std::cout << "vector::operator=(vec_times_scalar_proxy)" << std::endl; 
00410         viennacl::linalg::mult(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), *this);
00411         return *this;
00412       }
00413 
00418       template <typename VectorType>   //use template to cover const/non-const of VectorType:
00419       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & operator = (const vector_expression< VectorType,
00420                                                                            const SCALARTYPE,
00421                                                                            op_prod> & proxy)
00422       {
00423         resize(proxy.get_lhs().size());
00424         viennacl::linalg::mult(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), *this);
00425         return *this;
00426       }
00427 
00432       template <typename VectorType>   //use template to cover const/non-const of VectorType:
00433       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & operator = (const vector_expression< VectorType,
00434                                                                            const scalar<SCALARTYPE>,
00435                                                                            op_div> & proxy)
00436       {
00437         resize(proxy.get_lhs().size());
00438         //std::cout << "vector::operator=(vec_times_scalar_proxy)" << std::endl; 
00439         viennacl::linalg::divide(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), *this);
00440         return *this;
00441       }
00442 
00447       template <typename VectorType>   //use template to cover const/non-const of VectorType:
00448       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & operator = (const vector_expression< VectorType,
00449                                                                            const SCALARTYPE,
00450                                                                            op_div> & proxy)
00451       {
00452         resize(proxy.get_lhs().size());
00453         //std::cout << "vector::operator=(vec_times_scalar_proxy)" << std::endl; 
00454         viennacl::linalg::mult(proxy.get_lhs(), static_cast<SCALARTYPE>(1.0) / proxy.get_rhs(), *this);
00455         return *this;
00456       }
00457 
00458       //v1 = v2 + v3; 
00463       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & operator = (const vector_expression< vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00464                                                                            vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00465                                                                            op_add> & proxy)
00466       {
00467         resize(proxy.get_lhs().size());
00468         //std::cout << "vector::operator=(vec_times_scalar_proxy)" << std::endl; 
00469         viennacl::linalg::add(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), *this);
00470         return *this;
00471       }
00472       
00473       //v1 = v2 - v3; 
00478       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & operator = (const vector_expression< vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00479                                                                            vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00480                                                                            op_sub> & proxy)
00481       {
00482         resize(proxy.get_lhs().size());
00483         //std::cout << "vector::operator=(vec_times_scalar_proxy)" << std::endl; 
00484         viennacl::linalg::sub(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), *this);
00485         return *this;
00486       }

00680       //enlarge or reduce allocated memory and set unused memory to zero
00686       void resize(unsigned int new_size, bool preserve = true)
00687       {
00688         if (new_size > 0)
00689         {
00690           unsigned int new_internal_size = viennacl::tools::roundUpToNextMultiple<unsigned int>(new_size, ALIGNMENT);
00691           if (new_internal_size > _internal_size) //enlarge buffer
00692           {
00693             if (_internal_size == 0)
00694             {
00695               _elements = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*new_internal_size);
00696               //set new memory to zero:
00697               std::vector<SCALARTYPE> temp(new_internal_size);
00698               cl_int err = clEnqueueWriteBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements, CL_TRUE, 0, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*temp.size(), &(temp[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00699               CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00700             }
00701             else
00702             {
00703               viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> _elements_old = _elements;
00704               _elements = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*new_internal_size);
00705               cl_int err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements_old, _elements, 0, 0, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*_size, 0, NULL, NULL);
00706               CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00707               
00708               //set new memory to zero:
00709               std::vector<SCALARTYPE> temp(new_internal_size - _size);
00710               err = clEnqueueWriteBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements, CL_TRUE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*_size, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*temp.size(), &(temp[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00711               CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00712             }
00713             _internal_size = new_internal_size;
00714           }
00715           else if (new_internal_size < _internal_size)
00716           {
00717             viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> _elements_old = _elements;
00718             _elements = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*new_internal_size);
00719             cl_int err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements_old, _elements, 0, 0, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*new_size, 0, NULL, NULL);
00720             CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00721 
00722             //set padded memory to zero:
00723             if (new_internal_size > new_size)
00724             {
00725               std::vector<SCALARTYPE> temp(new_internal_size - new_size);
00726               err = clEnqueueWriteBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements, CL_TRUE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*new_size, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*temp.size(), &(temp[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00727               CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00728             }
00729             
00730             _internal_size = new_internal_size;
00731           }
00732           else  //same internal size, thus no memory creation needed, but unused memory must be set to zero:
00733           {
00734             if (_size != new_size && _internal_size > new_size)
00735             {
00736               std::vector<SCALARTYPE> temp(_internal_size - new_size);
00737               cl_int err = clEnqueueWriteBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements, CL_TRUE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*new_size, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*temp.size(), &(temp[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00738               CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00739               viennacl::ocl::finish();
00740             }
00741           }
00742           
00743           _size = new_size;
00744         }
00745       }
00746       
00747 
00748       //read-write access to an element of the vector
00751       vector_entry_proxy<SCALARTYPE> operator()(unsigned int index)
00752       {
00753         return vector_entry_proxy<SCALARTYPE>(index, viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements);
00754       }
00755 
00758       vector_entry_proxy<SCALARTYPE> operator[](unsigned int index)
00759       {
00760         return vector_entry_proxy<SCALARTYPE>(index, viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements);
00761       }
00762 
00763 
00766       scalar<SCALARTYPE> operator()(unsigned int index) const
00767       {
00768         scalar<SCALARTYPE> tmp;
00769         cl_int err;
00770         err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements, tmp.handle(), sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*index, 0, sizeof(SCALARTYPE), 0, NULL, NULL);
00771         //assert(err == CL_SUCCESS);
00772         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00773         return tmp;
00774       }
00775       
00778       scalar<SCALARTYPE> operator[](unsigned int index) const
00779       {
00780         return operator()(index);
00781       }
00782

00786       {
00787         viennacl::linalg::inplace_add(*this, vec);
00788         return *this;
00789       }

00796       {
00797         viennacl::linalg::inplace_mul_add(*this, proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs());
00798         return *this;

00920       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> operator + (const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & vec) const
00921       {
00922         vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(_internal_size);
00923         viennacl::linalg::add(*this, vec, result);
00924         return result;
00925       }
00926       
00929       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> operator + (const vector_expression< vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00930                                                                          const scalar<SCALARTYPE>,
00931                                                                            op_prod> & proxy) const
00932       {
00933         vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(_internal_size);
00934         viennacl::linalg::mul_add(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), *this, result);
00935         return result;
00936       }

00976       {

00978         viennacl::linalg::sub(*this, vec, result);
00979         return result;

00984       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> operator - (const vector_expression< vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00985                                                                          const scalar<SCALARTYPE>,
00986                                                                            op_prod> & proxy) const
00987       {
00988         vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(_internal_size);
00989         result = *this;
00990         viennacl::linalg::inplace_mul_sub(result, proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs());
00991         return result;
00992       }
00993 
00996       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> operator - (const vector_expression< const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00997                                                                          const scalar<SCALARTYPE>,
00998                                                                            op_prod> & proxy) const
00999       {
01000         vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(_internal_size);
01001         result = *this;
01002         viennacl::linalg::inplace_mul_sub(result, proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs());

01067 
01068       iterator begin()
01069       {
01070         return iterator(*this, 0);
01071       }
01072 
01074       iterator end()
01075       {
01076         return iterator(*this, size());
01077       }
01078 
01080       const_iterator begin() const
01081       {
01082         return const_iterator(*this, 0);
01083       }
01084 
01086       const_iterator end() const
01087       {
01088         return const_iterator(*this, size());
01089       }
01090 
01093       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & swap(vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & other)
01094       {
01095         swap(*this, other);
01096         return *this;
01097       };
01098       
01101       const unsigned int & size() const { return _size; }
01102       
01105       unsigned int max_size() const
01106       {
01107         return (128*1024*1024) / sizeof(SCALARTYPE);  //128 MB is maximum size of memory chunks in OpenCL!
01108       }
01111       const unsigned int & internal_size() const { return _internal_size; }
01112       
01114       bool empty() { return _size == 0; }
01115       
01117       const viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> & handle() const { return _elements; }
01118 
01121       void clear()
01122       {
01123         unsigned int pos = 0;
01124         viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::clear.setArgument(pos++, _elements);
01125         viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::clear.setArgument(pos++, _internal_size);
01126         
01127         viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::clear.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_groups() * viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group(),
01128                                                                                 viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group());
01129       }
01130       //void swap(vector & other){}
01131       
01132 
01133       //TODO: Think about implementing the following public member functions
01134       //void insert_element(unsigned int i, SCALARTYPE val){}
01135       //void erase_element(unsigned int i){}
01136 
01137     private:
01138       unsigned int _size;
01139       unsigned int _internal_size;
01140       viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> _elements;
01141     }; //vector

01145     
01152     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, typename CPU_ITERATOR>
01153     void copy(const const_vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_begin,
01154               const const_vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_end,
01155               CPU_ITERATOR cpu_begin )
01156     {
01157       if (gpu_begin.get_vector_readable().size() != 0)
01158       {
01159         std::vector<SCALARTYPE> temp_buffer(gpu_end - gpu_begin);
01160         cl_int err = clEnqueueReadBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(),
01161                                          gpu_begin.get_vector_readable().handle(), CL_TRUE, 0, 
01162                                          sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*(gpu_end - gpu_begin),
01163                                          &(temp_buffer[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
01164         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
01165         viennacl::ocl::finish();
01166         
01167         //now copy entries to cpu_vec:
01168         std::copy(temp_buffer.begin(), temp_buffer.end(), cpu_begin);
01169       }
01170     }
01171 
01178     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, typename CPU_ITERATOR>
01179     void copy(const vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_begin,
01180               const vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_end,
01181               CPU_ITERATOR cpu_begin )
01182     {
01183       copy(const_vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>(gpu_begin),
01184            const_vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>(gpu_end),
01185            cpu_begin);
01186     }
01187     
01193     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, typename CPUVECTOR>
01194     void copy(vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_vec,
01195               CPUVECTOR & cpu_vec )
01196     {
01197       viennacl::copy(gpu_vec.begin(), gpu_vec.end(), cpu_vec.begin());
01198     }
01199 
01200     //from gpu to cpu. Type assumption: cpu_vec lies in a linear memory chunk
01212     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, typename CPU_ITERATOR>
01213     void fast_copy(const const_vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_begin,
01214                    const const_vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_end,
01215                    CPU_ITERATOR cpu_begin )
01216     {
01217       if (gpu_begin.get_vector().size() != 0)
01218       {
01219         cl_int err = clEnqueueReadBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(),
01220                                          gpu_begin.get_vector_readable().handle(), CL_TRUE, 0,
01221                                          sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*(gpu_end - gpu_begin),
01222                                          &(*cpu_begin), 0, NULL, NULL);
01223         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
01224         viennacl::ocl::finish();
01225       }
01226     }
01227 
01228 
01229     //from cpu to gpu. Safe assumption: cpu_vector does not necessarily occupy a linear memory segment, but is not larger than the allocated memory on the GPU
01236     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, typename CPU_ITERATOR>
01237     void copy(CPU_ITERATOR const & cpu_begin,
01238               CPU_ITERATOR const & cpu_end,
01239               const vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_begin)
01240     {
01241       if (cpu_begin != cpu_end)
01242       {
01243         //we require that the size of the gpu_vector is larger or equal to the cpu-size
01244         std::vector<SCALARTYPE> temp_buffer(cpu_end - cpu_begin);
01245         std::copy(cpu_begin, cpu_end, temp_buffer.begin());
01246         cl_int err = clEnqueueWriteBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(),
01247                                           gpu_begin.get_vector_writeable().handle(), CL_TRUE, 0,
01248                                           sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*(cpu_end - cpu_begin),
01249                                           &(temp_buffer[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
01250         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
01251       }
01252     }
01253 
01259     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, typename CPUVECTOR>
01260     void copy(const CPUVECTOR & cpu_vec, vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_vec)
01261     {
01262       copy(cpu_vec.begin(), cpu_vec.end(), gpu_vec.begin());
01263     }
01264 
01265     
01277     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, typename CPU_ITERATOR>
01278     void fast_copy(CPU_ITERATOR const & cpu_begin,
01279                    CPU_ITERATOR const & cpu_end,
01280                    const vector_iterator<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_begin)
01281     {
01282       if (cpu_begin != cpu_end)
01283       {
01284         //we require that the size of the gpu_vector is larger or equal to the cpu-size
01285         cl_int err = clEnqueueWriteBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), 
01286                                           gpu_begin.get_vector_writeable().handle(), CL_TRUE, 0, 
01287                                           sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*(cpu_end - cpu_begin), &(*cpu_begin), 0, NULL, NULL);
01288         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
01289       }
01290     }
01291 
01292     //global functions for handling vectors:
01297     template<class SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
01298     std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream & s, vector<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT> const & val)
01299     {
01300       viennacl::ocl::finish();
01301       std::vector<SCALARTYPE> tmp(val.size());
01302       copy(val.begin(), val.end(), tmp.begin());
01303       std::cout << "[" << val.size() << "](";
01304       for (unsigned int i=0; i<val.size(); ++i)
01305       {
01306         if (i > 0)
01307           s << ",";
01308         s << tmp[i];
01309       }
01310       std::cout << ")" << std::endl;
01311       return s;
01312     }
01313 
01320     template<class SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
01321     void swap(viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & vec1,
01322               viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & vec2, 
01323               unsigned int NUM_THREADS = viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group())
01324     {
01325       assert(vec1.size() == vec2.size());
01326 
01327       unsigned int pos = 0;
01328       viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::swap.setArgument(pos++, vec1.handle());
01329       viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::swap.setArgument(pos++, vec2.handle());
01330       viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::swap.setArgument(pos++, vec1.size());
01331 
01332       viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::swap.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_groups() * NUM_THREADS, NUM_THREADS);
01333     }

01343     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int A>
01344     vector_expression< const vector<SCALARTYPE, A>, const SCALARTYPE, op_prod> operator * (SCALARTYPE const & value, vector<SCALARTYPE, A> const & vec)
01345     {
01346       return vector_expression< const vector<SCALARTYPE, A>, const SCALARTYPE, op_prod>(vec, value);
01347     }
01348 
01354     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int A>
01355     vector_expression< const vector<SCALARTYPE, A>, const scalar<SCALARTYPE>, op_prod> operator * (scalar<SCALARTYPE> const & value, vector<SCALARTYPE, A> const & vec)
01356     {
01357         return vector_expression< const vector<SCALARTYPE, A>, const scalar<SCALARTYPE>, op_prod>(vec, value);
01358     }

01360 
01361     //addition and subtraction of two vector_expressions:
01367     template <typename LHS1, typename RHS1, typename OP1,
01368               typename LHS2, typename RHS2, typename OP2>
01369     typename vector_expression< LHS1, RHS1, OP1>::VectorType
01370     operator + (vector_expression< LHS1, RHS1, OP1> const & proxy1,
01371                 vector_expression< LHS2, RHS2, OP2> const & proxy2)
01372     {
01373       assert(proxy1.size() == proxy2.size());
01374       typename vector_expression< LHS1, RHS1, OP1>::VectorType result(proxy1.size());
01375       result = proxy1;
01376       result += proxy2;
01377       return result;
01378     }
01379 
01385     template <typename LHS1, typename RHS1, typename OP1,
01386               typename LHS2, typename RHS2, typename OP2>
01387     typename vector_expression< LHS1, RHS1, OP1>::VectorType
01388     operator - (vector_expression< LHS1, RHS1, OP1> const & proxy1,
01389                 vector_expression< LHS2, RHS2, OP2> const & proxy2)
01390     {
01391       assert(proxy1.size() == proxy2.size());
01392       typename vector_expression< LHS1, RHS1, OP1>::VectorType result(proxy1.size());
01393       result = proxy1;
01394       result -= proxy2;
01395       return result;
01396     }
01397     
01399     
01405     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int A, typename LHS, typename RHS, typename OP>
01406     vector<SCALARTYPE, A> operator + (vector_expression< LHS, RHS, OP> const & proxy,
01407                                       vector<SCALARTYPE, A> const & vec)
01408     {
01409       assert(proxy.size() == vec.size());
01410       vector<SCALARTYPE, A> result(vec.size());
01411       result = proxy;
01412       result += vec;
01413       return result;
01414     }
01415 
01421     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int A, typename LHS, typename RHS, typename OP>
01422     vector<SCALARTYPE, A> operator - (vector_expression< LHS, RHS, OP> const & proxy,
01423                                       vector<SCALARTYPE, A> const & vec)
01424     {
01425       assert(proxy.size() == vec.size());
01426       vector<SCALARTYPE, A> result(vec.size());
01427       result = proxy;
01428       result -= vec;
01429       return result;
01430     }

01438     template <typename SCALARTYPE, typename LHS, typename RHS, typename OP>
01439     vector<SCALARTYPE> operator * (vector_expression< LHS, RHS, OP> const & proxy,
01440                                    scalar<SCALARTYPE> const & val)
01441     {
01442       vector<SCALARTYPE> result(proxy.size());
01443       result = proxy;
01444       result *= val;
01445       return result;
01446     }

01453     template <typename SCALARTYPE, typename LHS, typename RHS, typename OP>
01454     vector<SCALARTYPE> operator / (vector_expression< LHS, RHS, OP> const & proxy,
01455                                       scalar<SCALARTYPE> const & val)
01456     {
01457       vector<SCALARTYPE> result(proxy.size());
01458       result = proxy;
01459       result /= val;
01460       return result;
01461     }

01471     template <typename SCALARTYPE, typename LHS, typename RHS, typename OP>
01472     vector<SCALARTYPE> operator * (scalar<SCALARTYPE> const & val,
01473                                    vector_expression< LHS, RHS, OP> const & proxy)
01474     {
01475       vector<SCALARTYPE> result(proxy.size());
01476       result = proxy;
01477       result *= val;
01478       return result;
01479     }
01480     
01486     template <typename SCALARTYPE, typename LHS, typename RHS, typename OP>
01487     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE> operator * (SCALARTYPE val,
01488                                    viennacl::vector_expression< LHS, RHS, OP> const & proxy)
01489     {
01490       viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE> result(proxy.size());
01491       result = proxy;
01492       result *= val;
01493       return result;
01494     }
01495 
01496 }

01498 #endif
